name: BIND (Alpha Preview)
description:
BIND is a 2D skill based platformer with bite-size mechanics. Inspired by Ori, Hollow Knight and Kirby! The game takes the Mario-like powerups approach and expand it to create unique ways of solving puzzles and navigating on a beautiful 2D hand drawn world!

**Please note that this demo is on early preview and it was meant as a submission for BIG Festival.
